sentences.en: Colum drained the dregs from his cup.
sentences.cn: 科拉姆将杯中所剩一饮而尽。

sentences.en: Dregs settled at the bottom of the container.
sentences.cn: 渣滓沉淀在容器的底部.

sentences.en: He made me drink the cup of humiliation to the very dregs.
sentences.cn: 他叫我一滴不剩地饮干了耻辱之酒.

sentences.en: He sees dissidents as the dregs of society.
sentences.cn: 他视与他政见相左的人为社会渣滓。

sentences.en: I finished the dregs of my tea.
sentences.cn: 我把茶的残渣也喝光了.

sentences.en: Last one to the house drinks the keg dregs!
sentences.cn: 最后到达那个房子的人要罚他喝猫尿!

sentences.en: Pour the dregs away and rinse the pot.
She had drunk her coffee down to the dregs.
The catalysis - acid leaching process of copper bismuth sulphide dregs is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了用催化酸浸工艺从铜铋硫化物渣中回收铜.

sentences.en: The dregs have settled at the bottom of the bottle.
The dregs settled and the liquid became clear.
sentences.cn: 渣滓沉淀下来,液体变清了.

sentences.en: The prisoner drained the cup of sorrow to the dregs.
We should execute and destroy such veritable fiends and dregs of humanity.
sentences.cn: 我们应当处决并消灭这种不折不扣的魔鬼,人类的渣滓.

sentences.en: Work automatically and continual discharge filtrate and dregs, automatically flush, high efficiency.
sentences.cn: 进水、出水、出渣 、 反冲洗连续运行, 效率高.

words.tran_cn: 渣滓；少量；沉淀物（dreg的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 沉淀物，残渣，渣滓，糟，沉渣
trans.tran_en: not polite an offensive expression used to describe the people that you consider are the least important or useful in society
